review: MOST ALL OF THE MOVIES & TV SHOWS ARE REAL OLD UNLESS YOU PAY FOR THEM JUST LIKE YOU WOULD ON REGULAR TV
author: Sally B.

review: This was the most annoying thing to set up.  I still don"t know if I'm keeping it.  My HDMI is in the back of my plasma and even with theextender the stick does not stick out very far.  I could not figure out why I couldn't get it to work for the longest time!  All the new electronics Ihave the signal bounces around and connects and this thing bounced but was so slow it was CRAZY!  If your HDMI is in the back DO NOTBUY IT.  I have it taped so it barely sticks out.  If you have Amazon prime you'll get more use out of it than I am.  I mainly bought it for Netflixbut since its slow I don't know if I'll keep it. If you do want this device e prepared to wait.  Amazon is always fast with my deliveries, but itwill take awhile to get this device.  I waited almost 3 weeks, which is unheard of for Amazon.
author: Amazon buyer

review: It is amazing!!! I love it! I  am so happy I got it, totally worth the price! I can listen to my pandora, watch youtube,...it's very fast... IT'S AMAZING !!!
author: Anita Simic "nitica"

review: Very easy to set up. Plug it in, register it to your account and your ready to go. Every show and movie streams smoothly and no bufffering slowing it down. Would recommend to everyone.
author: Cheryl Matela

review: Works great very easy to install and operate .
author: Joy Albert

review: Too soon to give an accurate review so far I like my Roku better.
author: George E. Dunn "ED"

review: We love our Fire stick.  Easy to set up and use.  Good price too.
author: luvmydogs

review: This device is more than I expected, but not in a good way. Much to my dismay and contrary to all of the advertised images, this thumb-drive-sized unit must be plugged into AC power in order to work. If I had known that, I'd likely have opted for the larger but more versatile Fire a TV or another Apple TV unit. That said, it performs well. It is faster than my Apple TV, just not as versatile.
author: Michael S.
